alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Eastern Lincoln County; Far Northeast Highlands; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 30 at 1:59AM MST until January 30 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Eastern Lincoln County, Guadalupe County, Far Northeast Highlands, Northeast Highlands, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility and a light glaze of ice could make driving conditions hazardous. This includes Interstate 25 from Raton to Las Vegas, Interstate 40 between Santa Rosa and Clines Corners, U.S. 285 from Clines Corners to Vaughn, U.S. 380 near Picacho, and U.S. 82 near Dunken.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Eastern Lincoln County; Far Northeast Highlands; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Southwest Chaves County
